language.title: Language
language.description: Language of the resource. Preferred code following the [ISO 639-2](http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/) (alpha-3 code)

codeListValue.title: Character set code, e.g 'utf8'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_CharacterSetCode) CharacterSet codelist

codeList.title: Codelist used for character sets. Recommended URI: http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_CharacterSetCode

topicCategory.title: Topic Category
topicCategory.description: Topic category of the resource. e.g. `owner`. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_TopicCategoryCode) TopicCategory codelist. Suggested values: {`farming`, `biota`, `boundaries`, `climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere`, `economy`, `elevation`, `environment`, `geoscientificInformation`, `health`, `imageryBaseMapsEarthCover`, `intelligenceMilitary`, `inlandWaters`, `location`, `oceans`, `planningCadastre`, `society`, `structure`, `transportation`, `utilitiesCommunication`, `extraTerrestrial`, `disaster`}

scope.title: Scope / Hierarchy Level
scope.description: Scope(s), or 'hierarchy level(s)' applicable to the dataset description e.g. dataset, series. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MX_ScopeCode) Scope codelist. Suggested values: `attribute`, `attributeType`, `collectionHardware`, `collectionSession`, `dataset`, `series`, `nonGeographicDataset`, `dimensionGroup`, `feature`, `featureType`, `propertyType`, `fieldSession`, `software`, `service`, `model`, `tile`, `initiative`, `stereomate`, `sensor`, `platformSeries`, `sensorSeries`, `productionSeries`, `transferAggregate`, `otherAggregate`

type.title: Date type
type.description: Date type e.g. `publication`, `revision`, `creation`, `expiry`, `lastUpdate`, `lastRevision`, `deprecated`. See full list at [data.noaa.gov](https://data.noaa.gov/resources/iso19139/schema/resources/Codelist/gmxCodelists.xml#CI_DateTypeCode)

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: Protocol used to access the resource, eg HTTP, FTP

responsibleParty.title: Responsible party
responsibleParty.description: Definition of a responsible party (individual or organization)

contactInfo.title: Contact info
contactInfo.description: Information to contact the responsible party

role.title: Role
role.description: Role of the responsible party. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#CI_RoleCode) Role codelist. Suggested values: {`resourceProvider`, `custodian`, `owner`, `sponsor`, `user`, `distributor`, `originator`, `pointOfContact`, `principalInvestigator`, `processor`, `publisher`, `author`, `coAuthor`, `collaborator`, `editor`, `mediator`, `rightsHolder`, `contributor`, `funder`, `stakeholder`}

citation.title: Citation
citation.description: A set of elements to describe a resource citation

date.title: Citation date(s)
date.description: Date(s) associated to the resource citation

editionDate.title: Edition Date
editionDate.description: Date and time when the metadata record was created or updated. Requires an extended ISO 8601 formatted combined UTC date and time string (2009-11-17T10:00:00)

authority.title: Authority
authority.description: The authority that identifies uniquely the resource metadata

code.title: Code
code.description: A code uniquely identifying the resource metadata

citedResponsibleParty.title: Responsible party(ies)
citedResponsibleParty.description: Responsible party(ies) to cite in the resource citation

presentationForm.title: Presentation form
presentationForm.description: The resource presentation form. e.g. 'mapDigital'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#CI_PresentationFormCode) PresentationForm codelist. Suggested values: {`documentDigital`, `imageDigital`, `documentHardcopy`, `imageHardcopy`, `mapDigital`, `mapHardcopy`, `modelDigital`, `modelHardcopy`, `profileDigital`, `profileHardcopy`, `tableDigital`, `tableHardcopy`, `videoDigital`, `videoHardcopy`, `audioDigital`, `audioHardcopy`, `multimediaDigital`, `multimediaHardcopy`, `physicalSample`, `diagramDigital`, `diagramHardcopy`}

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the series in which the resource is cited

page.title: Page
page.description: Identification of the series page in which the resource is cited

maintenanceAndUpdateFrequency.title: Maintenance and Update Frequency
maintenanceAndUpdateFrequency.description: Frequency of maintenance/update of a resource. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_MaintenanceFrequencyCode) MaintenanceFrequency codelist. Suggested values: {`continual`, `daily`, `weekly`, `fortnightly`, `monthly`, `quarterly`, `biannually`, `annually`, `asNeeded`, `irregular`, `notPlanned`, `unknown`}

dateOfNextUpdate.title: Date of Next Update
dateOfNextUpdate.description: Date of the next update of the resource. Requires an extended ISO 8601 formatted combined UTC date and time string (2009-11-17T10:00:00)

updateScope.title: Update Scope
updateScope.description: Scope of data to which maintenance is applied

scope.title: Update Scope
scope.description: Scope of data to which maintenance is applied

description.title: Update Scope Description
description.description: Additional information about the range or extent of the resource

FormatDistributor.title: Distributor
FormatDistributor.description: Responsible party in charge of the format distribution

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Set of keywords for a given type of keywords, eg. theme, project, instrument

type.title: Keyword type

thesaurusName.title: Thesaurus
thesaurusName.description: Thesaurus to which keywords are associated

restriction.title: Restriction
restriction.description: A restriction to access/use a resource. e.g. 'dataset'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_RestrictionCode) Restriction codelist. Suggested values: {`copyright`, `patent`, `patentPending`, `trademark`, `license`, `intellectualPropertyRights`, `restricted`, `otherRestrictions`, `unrestricted`, `licenceUnrestricted`, `licenceEndUser`, `licenceDistributor`, `private`, `statutory`, `confidential`, `SBU`, `in-confidence`}

legalConstraints.title: Legal constraints
legalConstraints.description: Legal constraints associated to the resource

accessConstraints.title: Access constraints
accessConstraints.description: A restriction to access/use a resource. e.g. 'dataset'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_RestrictionCode) Restriction codelist. Suggested values: {`copyright`, `patent`, `patentPending`, `trademark`, `license`, `intellectualPropertyRights`, `restricted`, `otherRestrictions`, `unrestricted`, `licenceUnrestricted`, `licenceEndUser`, `licenceDistributor`, `private`, `statutory`, `confidential`, `SBU`, `in-confidence`}

useConstraints.title: Use constraints
useConstraints.description: Legal constraints concerning the use of the resource, e.g. Terms of use statement, License. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_RestrictionCode) Restriction codelist. Suggested values: {`copyright`, `patent`, `patentPending`, `trademark`, `license`, `intellectualPropertyRights`, `restricted`, `otherRestrictions`, `unrestricted`, `licenceUnrestricted`, `licenceEndUser`, `licenceDistributor`, `private`, `statutory`, `confidential`, `SBU`, `in-confidence`}

otherConstraints.title: Other constraints
otherConstraints.description: Other legal constraints concerning the resource, e.g. additional information to complement the access/use constraints, Disclaimer

items.title: Other constraint associated to the resource

securityConstraints.title: Security constraints
securityConstraints.description: Security constraints associated to the resource

classification.title: Classification
classification.description: Security constraint classification , e.g. 'secret'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_ClassificationCode) Classification codelist. Suggested values: {`unclassified`, `restricted`, `confidential`, `secret`, `topSecret`, `SBU`, `forOfficialUseOnly`, `protected`, `limitedDistribution`}

classificationSystem.title: Classification system
classificationSystem.description: A specific classification system, eg. Organization-specific system to classify resource confidentiality

handlingDescription.title: Handling description
handlingDescription.description: A description for the security constraint associated to the resource

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: Direction of the parameter. Suggested values: {in, out, inout}

codeListValue.title: DCP, eg. 'WebServices'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#DCPList) DCP codelist. Suggested values: {COM, CORBA, JAVA, SQL, WebServices, XML}

codeList.title: Codelist used for DCPs. Recommended URI: http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#DCPList

codeSpace.title: Codespace of the DCPs. Recommended value: ISOTC211/19119

idno.title: Unique ID number for the document

version.title: Document version
version.description: Identify and describe the current version of the document

characterSet.title: Character set
characterSet.description: Metadata Character encoding used e.g. UTF-8

parentIdentifier.title: Unique parent identifier
parentIdentifier.description: Global unique persistent identifier of the parent record, eg. a data collection that includes several datasets

hierarchyLevel.title: Scope(s) / Hierarchy Level(s)
hierarchyLevel.description: List of Scope(s), or 'hierarchy level(s)'. e.g. `dataset`, `service`. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MX_ScopeCode) Scope codelist.  (string)

hierarchyLevelName.title: Scope / hierarchy level names.
hierarchyLevelName.description: List of scope / hierarchy level names. Alternative to the use of 'hierarchyLevel' code items.

dateStamp.title: Metadata Date Stamp
dateStamp.description: Date and time when the metadata record was created or updated. Requires an extended ISO 8601 formatted combined UTC date and time string (2009-11-17T10:00:00)

metadataStandardName.title: Metadata standard name
metadataStandardName.description: Standard name of the metadata standard used. Recommended value: ISO 19115:2003/19139

metadataStandardVersion.title: Metadata standard version
metadataStandardVersion.description: Version of the metadata standard used. Optional for ISO/TC211 standard if the metadata standard name includes the inception year

dataSetURI.title: Dataset URI
dataSetURI.description: A URI that uniquely identifies the dataset

vectorSpatialRepresentation.description: Vector Resource spatial representation - Spatial representation information for the dataset (resource). Best practice is to include metadata for spatial representation if the described resource is a georeferenced vector dataset.

topologyLevel.title: Topology Level
topologyLevel.description: Topology level associated to the vector resource. Codelist value according to the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_TopologyLevelCode) TopologyLevel codelist. Possible values: {`geometryOnly`, `topology1D`, `planarGraph`, `fullPlanarGraph`, `surfaceGraph`, `fullSurfaceGraph`, `topology3D`, `fullTopology3D`, `abstract`}

geometricObjects.title: Geometric objects definition(s)
geometricObjects.description: Definition(s) of the geometric objects including the geometry type and count

items.title: Geometric object definition
items.description: Definition of the geometric objects including the geometry type and count

geometricObjectType.title: Geometric Object Type
geometricObjectType.description: Identification of the objects used to represent features in the vector spatial dataset. Codelist value according to the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_GeometricObjectTypeCode) GeometricObjectType codelist. Possible values: {`complex`, `composite`, `curve`, `point`, `solid`, `surface`}

geometricObjectCount.title: Geometric Object count
geometricObjectCount.description: Number of geometric objects available for the resource

gridSpatialRepresentation.description: Grid  Resource spatial representation - Spatial representation information for the dataset (resource). Best practice is to include metadata for spatial representation if the described resource is a georeferenced gridded / raster dataset.

numberOfDimensions.title: Number of dimensions
numberOfDimensions.description: Number of dimensions in the grid

dimensionName.title: Dimension name type
dimensionName.description: name type of the dimension. Codelist value according to the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_DimensionNameTypeCode) DimensionNameType codelist. Possible values: {`row`, `column`, `vertical`, `track`, `crossTrack`, `line`, `sample`, `time`}

resolution.title: Dimension resolution
resolution.description: Resolution associated to the dimension. The resolution is handled as 'measure' which could be either a length, distance [special measure of length), angle or scale.
resolution._xpath_note: gco:Measure is an abstract element, use sub-classes gco:Length/gco:Distance/gco:Angle/gco:Scale

uom.title: Unit Of Measure
uom.description: Unit considered for the resolution measure

cellGeometry.title: Cell geometry
cellGeometry.description: Type of geometry used for the grid cells. Codelist value according to the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_CellGeometryCode) CellGeometryCode codelist. Possible values: {`point`, `area`, `voxel`, `stratum`}

transformationParameterAvailability.title: Transformation Parameter Availability
transformationParameterAvailability.description: Indicates whether grid transformation parameters are available

referenceSystemInfo.title: Resource Reference Systems
referenceSystemInfo.description: Resource's spatial reference systems - Description of the spatial and/or temporal reference systems used in the dataset.

credit.title: Credit
credit.description: Credit associated to the dataset resource

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of the dataset resource. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode) Progress codelist. Suggested values: {`completed`, `historicalArchive`, `obsolete`, `onGoing`, `planned`, `required`, `underDevelopment`, `final`, `pending`, `retired`, `superseded`, `tentative`, `valid`, `accepted`, `notAccepted`, `withdrawn`, `proposed`, `deprecated`}

pointOfContact.title: Points of contact
pointOfContact.description: One or more points of contacts for the resource

resourceMaintenance.title: Resource maintenance
resourceMaintenance.description: Information about the dataset resource maintenance

graphicOverview.title: Graphic Overview(s)
graphicOverview.description: Graphic Overview(s) for the dataset resource

descriptiveKeywords.title: Descriptive keywords
descriptiveKeywords.description: Descriptive keywords, organized by keyword type

specificUsage.title: Specific usage description
specificUsage.description: A description of a specific usage of this resource relevant to highlight, eg. use case of interest, success story, data paper

usageDateTime.title: Metadata Date Stamp
usageDateTime.description: Date and time of the usage. Requires an extended ISO 8601 formatted combined UTC date and time string (2009-11-17T10:00:00)

aggregationInfo.title: Aggregate information
aggregationInfo.description: Identification of aggregate that encompasses the described resource, eg. data collection

associationType.title: Association type
associationType.description: Type of association between the dataset resource and the aggregate Resource

codeListValue.title: Association type, eg. 'isComposedOf'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#DS_AssociationTypeCode) AssociationType codelist. Suggested values: {crossReference, largerWorkCitation, partOfSeamlessDatabase, source, stereoMate, isComposedOf, collectiveTitle, series, dependency, revisionOf}

codeList.title: Codelist used for association types. Recommended URI: http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#DS_AssociationTypeCode

codeSpace.title: Codespace of the association types codelist. Recommended value: ISOTC211/19115

initiativeType.title: Initiative type
initiativeType.description: Type of initative behind the aggregate Resource

codeListValue.title: Initiative type, eg. 'collection'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#DS_InitiativeTypeCode) InitiativeType codelist. Suggested values: {campaign, collection, dataDictionary, exercise, experiment, investigation, mission, sensor, operation, platform, process, program, project, sciencePaper, study, task, trial, userGuide}

codeList.title: Codelist used for initiative types. Recommended URI: http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#DS_InitiativeTypeCode

codeSpace.title: Codespace of the initiative types codelist. Recommended value: ISOTC211/19115

extent.title: Extent of the resource
extent.description: Defines the spatial (horizontal and vertical) and temporal region to which the content of the resource applies.

beginPosition.title: Begin time position
beginPosition.description: Begin time position. Requires an extended ISO 8601 formatted combined UTC date and time string (2009-11-17T10:00:00)

endPosition.title: End time position
endPosition.description: End time position. Requires an extended ISO 8601 formatted combined UTC date and time string (2009-11-17T10:00:00)

verticalCRS.title: Vertical CRS
verticalCRS.description: Vertical coordinate reference system used (as defined in the ISO 19136 / GML standard

spatialRepresentationType.title: Spatial Representation type
spatialRepresentationType.description: Spatial representation type of the resource. e.g. 'vector'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_SpatialRepresentationTypeCode) SpatialRepresentationType codelist. Suggested values: {`vector`, `grid`, `textTable`, `tin`, `stereoModel`, `video`}

uom.title: Unit Of Measure
uom.description: Unit considered for the resolution measure

language.title: Resource language(s)
language.description: Resource language(s). Preferred code following the [ISO 639-2](http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/) (alpha-3 code)

topicCategory.title: Topic categories
topicCategory.description: Topic category of the resource. e.g. `owner`. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_TopicCategoryCode) TopicCategory codelist. Suggested values: {`farming`, `biota`, `boundaries`, `climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere`, `economy`, `elevation`, `environment`, `geoscientificInformation`, `health`, `imageryBaseMapsEarthCover`, `intelligenceMilitary`, `inlandWaters`, `location`, `oceans`, `planningCadastre`, `society`, `structure`, `transportation`, `utilitiesCommunication`, `extraTerrestrial`, `disaster`}

fees.title: Fees
fees.description: Eventual fees associated with the service

plannedAvailableDateTime.title: Service availability Date Stamp
plannedAvailableDateTime.description: Date and time when the metadata record was created or updated. Requires an extended ISO 8601 formatted combined UTC date and time string (2009-11-17T10:00:00)

keywords.title: Service keywords
keywords.description: Service keywords, organized by keyword type

codeListValue.title: Coupling type, eg. 'loose'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#SV_CouplingTypeCode) CouplingType codelist. Suggested values: {loose, mixed, tight}

codeList.title: Codelist used for coupling types. Recommended URI: http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#SV_CouplingTypeCode

codeSpace.title: Codespace of the coupling types codelist. Recommended value: ISOTC211/19119

operatesOn.title: Operates on relationship(s)
operatesOn.description: List identifiers of datasets on which service operates on

uuidref.title: Unique dataset identifier within the same catalogue

contentInfo.title: Content information
contentInfo.description: Information on the resource content, ie data structure definition

featureCatalogueDescription.title: Feature Catalogue Description
featureCatalogueDescription.description: description of the feature catalogue (ISO 19110) associated to a vector resource, ie. the definition of the vector data structure

complianceCode.title: Compliance code
complianceCode.description: Indicates whether the dataset complies with the feature catalogue description

includedWithDataset.title: Included with dataset
includedWithDataset.description: Indicates if the feature catalogue (ISO 19110) is included with the dataset?

uuidref.title: Feature catalogue identifier
uuidref.description: Unique identifier of the feature catalogue (ISO 19110) within the same catalogue

href.title: Feature catalogue hyperlink
href.description: Hyperlink of the feature catalogue (ISO 19110) within the same catalogue

coverageDescription.title: Coverage Description
coverageDescription._xpath_note: MD_CoverageDescription is extended by the MI_CoverageDescription in the ISO 19115-2 extension for grid/imagery data
coverageDescription.description: description of the coverage (grid/raster), ie. the definition of the grid/raster data structure

codeListValue.title: Type of coverage content, eg. 'image'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_CoverageContentTypeCode) Coverage content type codelist. Suggested values: {image, thematicClassification, physicalMeasurement, auxillaryInformation, qualityInformation, referenceInformation, modelResult, coordinate, auxilliaryData}

codeList.title: Codelist used for coverage content types. Recommended URI: http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_CoverageContentTypeCode

codeSpace.title: Codespace of the coverage content types codelist. Recommended value: ISOTC211/19115

distributor.title: Distributor(s)
distributor.description: Responsible party(ies) in charge of the resource distribution

transferOptions.title: Digital transfer options
transferOptions.description: Options of digital transfer available for the resource

scope.title: Scope of the data quality information

report.title: Data quality report(s)
report.description: Data quality report(s) associated to the resource

result.title: Conformance Result
result.description: Result of conformance of the resource

measureIdentification.title: Measure identification
measureIdentification.description: Unique identifier for the data quality measure

measureDescription.title: Measure description
measureDescription.description: Description for the data quality measure

evaluationMethodType.title: Evaluation method type
evaluationMethodType.description: The type of method to evaluate the data quality measure. e.g. 'indirect'. Recommended code following the [ISO/TS 19139](http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml#DQ_EvaluationMethodTypeCode) TopicCategory codelist. Suggested values: {`directInternal`, `directExternal`, `indirect`}

evaluationMethodDescription.title: Evaluation method description
evaluationMethodDescription.description: a description of the data quality evaluation method

dateTime.title: Report Date Stamp
dateTime.description: Date and time when the data quality report has been established. Requires an extended ISO 8601 formatted combined UTC date and time string (2009-11-17T10:00:00)

result.title: Result(s)
result.description: Result(s) of consistency associated to the data quality report

specification.title: Result specification
specification.description: The specification(s) of the data quality conformance result

explanation.title: Result explanation
explanation.description: The explanation(s) of the data quality conformance (or non-conformance) result

pass.title: Result pass
pass.description: Indicates whether or not the conformance result is a success

lineage.title: Lineage
lineage.description: Description of the resource lineage, ie process steps performed to lead to the resource

statement.title: Lineage statement
statement.description: A description of the overall lineage information. eg. 'Data management workflow'

processStep.title: Process step(s)
processStep.description: Description of the process steps required to obtain the resource

dateTime.title: Date stamp
dateTime.description: Date and time when the data quality report has been established. Requires an extended ISO 8601 formatted combined UTC date and time string (2009-11-17T10:00:00)

processor.title: Processor(s)
processor.description: Responsible party(ies) in charge of the processing for the step

source.title: Source(s)
source.description: Source(s) processed during the process step

portrayalCatalogueInfo.title: Portrayal catalogue information
portrayalCatalogueInfo.description: Information identifying the portrayal catalogue used by the resource

scope.title: Scope(s)
scope.description: Subject domain(s) of feature types defined in this feature catalogue

fieldOfApplication.title: Field(s) of application
fieldOfApplication.description: Description of kind(s) of use to which this feature catalogue may be put

versionNumber.title: Version number
versionNumber.description: version number of this feature catalogue, which may include both a major version number or letter and a sequence of minor release numbers or letters, such as '3.2.4a.' The format of this attribute may differ between cataloguing authorities.

producer.title: Producer
producer.description: Name, address, country, and telecommunications address of person or organization having primary responsibility for the intellectual content of this feature catalogue

functionalLanguage.title: Functional language
functionalLanguage.description: Formal functional language in which the feature operation formal definition occurs in this feature catalogue

featureType.title: Feature type(s)
featureType.description: Feature type(s) contained in the catalogue

typeName.title: Type name
typeName.description: text string that uniquely identifies this feature type within the feature catalogue that contains this feature type

definition.title: Definition
definition.description: definition of the feature type in a natural language

code.title: Code
code.description: code that uniquely identifies this feature type within the feature catalogue that contains this feature type

isAbstract.title: Is abstract
isAbstract.description: indicates if the feature type is abstract or not

aliases.title: Alias(es)
aliases.description: equivalent name(s) of this feature type

carrierOfCharacteristics.title: Carrier(s) of characteristics
carrierOfCharacteristics.description: links this feature type to the property types that it contains

memberName.title: Member name
memberName.description: Name of the property member of the feature type

definition.title: Definition
definition.description: Definition of the property member of the feature type

cardinality.title: Cardinality
cardinality.description: Definition of the member type cardinality

code.title: Code
code.description: Code for the attribute member of the feature type

valueMeasurementUnit.title: Value measurement unit
valueMeasurementUnit.description: Measurement unit of the values (in case of variable)

valueType.title: Value type
valueType.description: Type of value. A good practice is to rely on primitive data types defined in the XML Schema https://www.w3.org/2009/XMLSchema/XMLSchema.xsd

listedValue.title: Listed value(s)
listedValue.description: List of controlled value(s) used in te attribute member
